experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Liricare is an online networking service for special needs professionals. The platform plans to offer its members curated news, jobs, case collaboration, and content monetization.

experience.title: Investor
experience.description: Rad Sports is a passion project. Our mission is to organize an amateur sporting world by bringing players, playing facilities and trainers together. Starting with one Soccer pitch in 2018 , we now have 6 soccer fields and 6 paddle courts in 2 facilities.
experience.description_html: Rad Sports is a passion project. Our mission is to organize an amateur sporting world by bringing players, playing facilities and trainers together. Starting with one Soccer pitch in 2018 , we now have 6 soccer fields and 6 paddle courts in 2 facilities. <!---->

experience.title: Co-Founder and Board Member
experience.description: In 2006, I co-founded Alpha Vista, a special needs services company based in Sunnyvale, California. Over the course of 10 years, we expanded to include more than 200 employees, predominantly speech therapists. These professionals provided care for about 10,000 children across California Public School Districts. During this period of growth, I played a crucial role in raising capital, building teams, and implementing innovative and successful projects, which resulted in the addition of over 100 customers worldwide. Alpha Vista was recognized by Inc500/5000 as one of the fastest-growing companies in the healthcare segment in 2011. In 2017 when we were acquired by the Stepping Stones Group, marking a successful exit.

experience.title: CEO
experience.description: I founded Info Vista in 2004 .We were a Global Consulting and Information Technology Services Corporation based in Sunnyvale, California with presence in India, UK and Middle East. In 2010 the US operations we were acquired by Cyntel Systems Inc. Currently we continue to provide Information Technology consulting services to key Government corporations in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.
